doc.previous: As of 2015 language enthusiasts attempt to start up courses for the language and culture especially in the Tweante region These are mostly studies aimed at the elderly They prove to be very popular nonetheless There still is no professional attempt to promote the language into the school curriculum
doc.after: Dutch Low Saxon comprises the following dialects from north to south
